text: Our Lord whomever You admit into the Fire to abide therein You will have abased You will have humiliated and the evildoers the disbelievers therein shall have no helpers to protect them from God’s chastisement exalted be He the overt noun ‘the evildoers’ has replaced the pronominalisation ‘whomever’ in order to inform that the punishment of abasement is specifically theirs; the min of min ansār ‘helpers’ is extra.
